notices.title: Important Announcement
notices.message: All employees are required to attend the meeting tomorrow at 10am in the conference room.

notices.title: Holiday Party Invitation
notices.message: Join us for our annual holiday party on December 15th at 6pm in the break room. Food and drinks will be provided!

notices.title: Department Meeting
notices.message: There will be a department meeting on Wednesday, December 20th at 2pm in the conference room.

notices.title: New Employee Orientation
notices.message: All new employees are required to attend orientation on their first day of work. Please report to the HR office at 9am.
